content: Singapore-based British entrepreneur and technology investor **Michael Robert Blakey** (born 1975 in [London](/wiki/London), [United Kingdom](/wiki/United_Kingdom)) is a [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)-based [British](/wiki/United_Kingdom) [entrepreneur](/wiki/Entrepreneur) and technology [investor](/wiki/Investor) who was named UK [Angel Investor](/wiki/Angel_investor) of the Year in 2015 by the UK Business Angels Association. Blakey co-founded Avonmore Developments Ltd. in London in 2000, followed by Cub Capital Pte. Ltd. in Singapore in 2013. In 2016, Blakey joined [William Klippgen](/wiki/William_Klippgen) to start Cocoon Capital - a venture capital firm targeting early-stage digital startups in Southeast Asia. The firm has so far raised two funds with an AUM of US$27m. ## Education Blakey holds a [Bachelor of Arts](/wiki/Bachelor_of_Arts) degree from the [College of William & Mary](/wiki/College_of_William_%26_Mary).[*citation needed*] - Avonmore Developments Ltd. - Cocoon Capital Partners Pte. Ltd.
title: Michael Robert Blakey
